data.name: Unplugged - Pantera Pack
data.detailed_description:
Unplugged only supports Valve Index® controllers
This content requires the base game Unplugged on Steam in order to play.

Unplugged: Pantera Pack


Crack those knuckles and get loud with these metal classics of Pantera! In this brand-new Pantera Pack, you get to unlock three Pantera-inspired virtual guitars and air guitar your way through the legendary, groovy and crushing tracks of this legendary band. Release your inner rock star!

The Pantera Pack includes the tracks:
  • I'm broken
  • Cowboys from hell
  • Cemetery gates
  • Becoming

data.short_description: Crack those knuckles and get loud with this Pantera Pack for Unplugged!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
